title: Species Profile Template
description: Comprehensive profile for a sentient species covering appearance, senses, disposition, world view, society, language, customs, history, relationships, supernatural abilities, technology, and combat. World view -- how the species thinks differently from humans -- is the most important differentiator.

nicknames.description: Common terms used by other species to refer to this one

classification.description: Whether this is a full species or a race of another species

parent_species_id.description: If this is a race, the parent species ID

famous_for.description: What this species is most known for (key reputation in one sentence)

settlement_type.description: How they live: in their own settlements, mixed with others, or wandering

settlement_characteristics.description: Architecture, materials, and defenses typical of their settlements

homes.description: Where homes are (on land, in trees, underground, underwater), layout, communal or individual, ceremonial rooms, weapon rooms, passed down generations

home_materials.description: Materials homes are made of (wood, brick, stone, straw)

habitat.description: Where this species lives and how

disposition_detail.description: Nuanced explanation of disposition -- uniformly evil species have limited utility

sight.description: Visual capability (night vision, color range, etc.)

other_senses.description: Electroception, nociception, time sense, magnetoception, magiception

senses.description: Sensory capabilities -- altering one or two senses provides meaningful differences

creator_god.description: The god who created or most influenced this species

world_view.description: How this species sees themselves, others, and their place in the world. This is the MOST IMPORTANT differentiator from humans. Write in paragraph form.

government_type.description: Typical government type for this species

marriage_family.description: Marriage norms, divorce customs, family structure

key_laws.description: Key laws or social rules unique to this species

customs.description: Key greetings, ceremonies, taboos, and cultural habits

inventions_discoveries.description: Notable inventions and discoveries by this species

races.description: Race hierarchy chart IDs for this species

general_description.description: General description of this species in a few sentences

wars_won_and_lost.description: Major wars this species has won and lost

inventions_and_discoveries.description: Major inventions and discoveries made by this species

society.description: Overview of this species' social structure and societal organization

ecology.description: Ecological role and environmental impact of this species

homes_styles_materials.description: Typical home construction styles and building materials used by this species

x-cross-references.god-profile: Creator god is defined in a God Profile
x-cross-references.race-hierarchy-chart: Races within this species are defined in Race Hierarchy Charts
x-cross-references.species-relationship-matrix: Relationships with other species are tracked in the Species Relationship Matrix
x-cross-references.sovereign-power-profile: This species populates sovereign powers defined in Sovereign Power Profiles
x-cross-references.settlement-profile: This species lives in settlements defined in Settlement Profiles
x-cross-references.culture-profile: Cultural practices of this species are detailed in Culture Profiles
